requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Celeron / Athlon Sempron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These are the recommended minimum specs as specified by AppGameKit Studio, the software the game is written in. But honestly, this thing will run on a potato.
